name: SanjeevKapoorSmartRecipes

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sanjeev kapoor recipes
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sanjeev Kapoor Smart Recipes is an Alexa skill, where you will find step by step voice instructions to prepare a great dish from a selection of over thousands of recipes across Indian and international cuisines. No more rewinding videos or turning pages with greasy hands. All you have to do is ask.

Just say, "Alexa, enable Sanjeev Kapoor Recipes" on your device, and ask for a recipe you like.

With voice guided cooking that is interactive and intelligent, Sanjeev Kapoor Recipes comes with helpful Chef Tips to make your cooking easier, more fun and definitely delicious.

Account Linking is optional in Sanjeev Kapoor Smart Recipes

Sanjeev Kapoor Smart Recipes is powered by tinychef.
